input.sentences: after the renovation | the address of this building will begin with 818 .
also | a fence is necessary for protection .
the removal of this music box will be necessary to rebuild .
this vehicle is for traveling for supplies while renovating .
this bicycle is needing several new parts for operation .
output.sentences: Time to begin renovation of the old building.
I don't think I will need much protection so I will remove the fence.
Much of the building will need to be rebuilt and many things will require removal however the saddest part will be painting over the music box mural.
There was much to do and I needed supplies but with a broken down vehicle traveling isn't an option.
Time to head for my bicycle, but I find that it too is not in operation so it looks like I'm waking.
